Text:
THANKS very much for this score... Carter Burwell is one of the most underrated and outstanding cinema theme composers alive, and he deserves a much larger audience.  He's not too fond of self-marketing, however, and he prefers to let his audience "feel" his music.  And that they do!  A truly unique and remarkable composer.

Once again, thanks for this, and "Happy Holidays!"

pls. upload also: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/say-somethin-single/id557264499
Austin Mahone - Say Somethin'
